mdb:name.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Cumberland Plain Tower Data Service

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG) Geodetic Parameter Registry
TERN OzFlux Cumberland Plain Tower Data Service

mcc:code.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Cumberland Plain Tower Data Service

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This service provides access to ecosystem flux data from Cumberland Plain in central New South Wales. The site is in a dry sclerophyll forest and is now an endangered ecological community.

gex:description.gco:CharacterString: Cumberland Plain, Hawkesbury Valley, New South Wales

srv:scopedName.gco:ScopedName: TERN OzFlux Cumberland Plain Tower Data Service

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: The mandatory SERVICE parameter indicates which of the available service types at a particular server is being invoked. When invoking GetCapabilities on a WMS the value WMS shall be used.
The mandatory REQUEST parameter indicates which service operation is being invoked. To invoke the GetCapabilities operation, the value GetCapabilities shall be used.

The optional VERSION parameter indicates the service type version number to use. In response to a GetCapabilities request that does not specify a version number, the server shall respond with the highest version it supports.

mrl:statement.gco:CharacterString: This is the initial publication of the OzFlux service. The lineage statement for the individual datasets must be reviewed separately.

mdb:name.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Ridgefield Tower Data Service

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG) Geodetic Parameter Registry
TERN OzFlux Ridgefield Tower Data Service

mcc:code.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Ridgefield Tower Data Service

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This service provides access to ecosystem flux data from Ridgefield in Western Australia. The site is is located in dryland agriculture dominated by broadacre farming practices, 12km west of Pingelly, near Perth.

srv:scopedName.gco:ScopedName: TERN OzFlux Ridgefield Tower Data Service

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: The mandatory SERVICE parameter indicates which of the available service types at a particular server is being invoked. When invoking GetCapabilities on a WMS the value WMS shall be used.
The mandatory REQUEST parameter indicates which service operation is being invoked. To invoke the GetCapabilities operation, the value GetCapabilities shall be used.

The optional VERSION parameter indicates the service type version number to use. In response to a GetCapabilities request that does not specify a version number, the server shall respond with the highest version it supports.

mrl:statement.gco:CharacterString: This is the initial publication of the OzFlux service. The lineage statement for the individual datasets must be reviewed separately.

TERN OzFlux Alice Springs Mulga Tower Data Service

mcc:code.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Alice Springs Mulga Tower Data Service

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This service provides access to ecosystem flux data from Pine Hill cattle station, near Alice Springs in the Northern Territory. The site has a mulga (Acacia aneura) canopy.

gex:description.gco:CharacterString: Alice Springs OzFlux Site, Northern Territory, Australia

srv:scopedName.gco:ScopedName: TERN OzFlux Alice Springs Mulga Tower Data Service

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG) Geodetic Parameter Registry
TERN OzFlux Dry River Tower Data Service

mcc:code.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Dry River Tower Data Service

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This service provides access to ecosystem flux data from the Dry River site, 89 km south of Katherine in the Northern Territory. The site is open forest savanna.

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG) Geodetic Parameter Registry
TERN OzFlux Robson Creek Tower Data Service

mcc:code.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Robson Creek Tower Data Service

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This service provides access to ecosystem flux data from Robson Creek in Far North Queensland. The site is complex mesophyll vine rainforest with canopy heights ranging from 23 to 44 m.

gex:description.gco:CharacterString: Robson Creek Site, Far North Queensland, Australia

srv:scopedName.gco:ScopedName: TERN OzFlux Robson Creek Tower Data Service

mdb:name.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Tumbarumba Tower Data Service

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG) Geodetic Parameter Registry
TERN OzFlux Tumbarumba Tower Data Service

mcc:code.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Tumbarumba Tower Data Service

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This service provides access to ecosystem flux data from Tumbarumba Bago State Forest, New South Wales. The forest is classified as wet sclerophyll, the dominant species is Eucalyptus delegatensis, and average tree height is 40m.

gex:description.gco:CharacterString: Tumbarumba Site, New South Wales, Australia

srv:scopedName.gco:ScopedName: TERN OzFlux Tumbarumba Tower Data Service

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: The mandatory SERVICE parameter indicates which of the available service types at a particular server is being invoked. When invoking GetCapabilities on a WMS the value WMS shall be used.

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG) Geodetic Parameter Registry
TERN OzFlux Loxton Tower Data Service

mcc:code.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Loxton Tower Data Service

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This service provides access to ecosystem flux data from an Almond Orchard in South Australia's Riverland. Site established in August 2008 and decommissioned in June 2009.

mdb:name.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Warra Tower Data Service

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG) Geodetic Parameter Registry
TERN OzFlux Warra Tower Data Service

mcc:code.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Warra Tower Data Service

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This service provides access to ecosystem flux data from Warra in Tasmania. The site is installed in a stand of tall, mixed-aged E. obliqua forest (77 and >250 years-old) with a rainforest understorey and a dense man-fern (Dicksonia antarctica) ground-layer.

srv:scopedName.gco:ScopedName: TERN OzFlux Warra Tower Data Service

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: The mandatory SERVICE parameter indicates which of the available service types at a particular server is being invoked. When invoking GetCapabilities on a WMS the value WMS shall be used.
The mandatory REQUEST parameter indicates which service operation is being invoked. To invoke the GetCapabilities operation, the value GetCapabilities shall be used.

TERN OzFlux Cow Bay Tower Data Service

mcc:code.gco:CharacterString: TERN OzFlux Cow Bay Tower Data Service

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This service provides access to ecosystem flux data from Cow Bay in Far North Queensland. The site is in lowland tropical rainforest at the Daintree Discovery Centre.
